name: ticonderoga_pencils
description: Ticonderoga #2 Wooden Pencils, 2.2mm, 12ct. When you're taking a test, trust Ticonderoga 12ct Wooden Pencils no.2. Everyone knows that some tests simply require a No. 2 pencil and when you need it you select 'The World's Best Pencil,' Ticonderoga. Tried and true and a time-tested favorite, this pencil will get you through with one less worry on test day. Package Quantity: 12. Includes: Pencil. Lead Size: 2.2mm. Lead Type: no. 2. Features: Low-odor, Non-toxic. Suggested Age: 3 Years and Up.
